name: The Devouring Mutations
description:
Shoot your way through mutated food, you can eat it, but be careful the food has effects on your body. 

WASD - move
SPACE - eat, open
E - plant bombs

LEFT MOUSE button - shoot

This made for the Discord jam 5 

Made by a talented music creator FabCho (FabCho #6093)

and a clumsy programmer d!P (d!P#0281)

Have fun playing the game!!!
